column3: Name: “Table 1 of 1 on page 101 of 124”
Table: 93
Capital Improvement Plan
DESCRIPTION
Implement activities associated with the Kecoughtan Road
Corridor Master Plan such as establishing a triangular space
at the intersection of Sunset Road and Southampton Avenue.
A small park space, monument or some other landmark form
would be established in the center.
Implement activities associated with the Kecoughtan Road
Corridor Master Plan such as generating an upgraded
LaSalle Avenue right-of-way which will better suit the
residential area.
The purpose of this project is to make streetscape
improvements along Mallory Street in keeping with those near
the 1-64 interchange.
Extend Medical Drive south from Marcella Road to
Cunningham Drive along the western property boundary of
Eaton Middle School.
Create plazas on Coliseum Lake as focal points to
commercial development both east and west of the Coliseum.
Streetscape project along N. King Street from Little Back
River Road north to the Langley Gate, including road and
traffic upgrades, bike lanes, multi-purpose trail, lighting and
landscaping.
Opportunity/incentive funds for future development in
Coliseum Central.
Implement activities of the Kecoughtan Road Corridor Master
Plan such as streetscape improvements to further Powhatan
Parkway south of Victoria Boulevard as a residential
boulevard and an entry feature at Powhatan Parkway and
Victoria Boulevard.
Anticipated funds needed for land acquisition, infrastructure
and commercial/retail incentives.
Relocate Blue Bird Gap Farm to enable new economic
development for revenue producing venture.
